function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of awareness of the effects of mobility and travel behavior on disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Public education and awareness campaigns about disease transmission through mobility and travel behavior","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms for spreading awareness","People":"Individual citizens, travelers, and commuters","Owner":"Government health agencies and travel organizations"},{"Description":"Ineffective implementation of Responsible Transport concept","Impact":"Failure to achieve safe, secure, and equitable mobility","Mitigation":"Integration of Responsible Transport principles into transport policies and planning, collaboration with public and private sector stakeholders","Technologies":"Transport planning and monitoring software","People":"Government policymakers, urban planners, transport operators","Owner":"Transport authorities and policymakers"},{"Description":"Resistance to change in global transport policies and planning","Impact":"Missed opportunity to transform global transport policies post-COVID","Mitigation":"Engagement with international organizations, research institutions, and industry stakeholders to advocate for Responsible Transport principles","Technologies":"Global transport policy analysis tools, virtual conferencing platforms for international collaboration","People":"Government representatives, industry leaders, research institutions","Owner":"International organizations and advocacy groups"}]}
